name: com.strangeland.steering
description: For now, it only supports Logitech steering wheels, but we have code and plans to extend it to DirectInput and other USB-based input devices. Please add https://github.com/Strange-Land/StrangeLandPackage.git to your projects manfiest file as a dependency!

samples.description: Simple scene and script to visualize steering wheel input (axes, buttons, force feedback) and verify provider setup.
Installs Logitech wheel support. Requires manual download of the Logitech Steering Wheel SDK and copying the wrapper and DLL as described in the README.
